myopenmath.statement:
Below is a picture of a lean-to greenhouse. The angle of elevation of the roof is \displaystyle{22}^{\circ}. The width is 5 feet and the height from the ground to the low part of the roof is 7 feet. What is the height from the ground to the top of the roof? 5.00 ft7.00 ft\displaystyle{22}^{\circ}?
The height from the ground to the top of the roof is feet.
Round to appropriate significant figures.
